issue.title: Add noexcept to several repeat_view[::iterator] member functions

discussion.p:
Several member functions of repeat_view::iterator only operate on its integer member, indicating that they do not throw.
Similarly, repeat_view::size should also be noexcept since it just performs the integer conversion.

li.p: Modify , class template repeat_view synopsis, as indicated:

blockquote.pre: constexpr auto size() const noexcept requires (!same_as<Bound, unreachable_sentinel_t>);

li.p: Modify , class repeat_view::iterator synopsis, as indicated:

blockquote.pre: friend constexpr bool operator==(const iterator& x, const iterator& y) noexcept;

blockquote.p: -15- Effects: Equivalent to: return x.current_ == y.current_;

blockquote.pre: friend constexpr auto operator<=>(const iterator&x, const iterator& y) noexcept;

blockquote.p: -16- Effects: Equivalent to: return x.current_ <=> y.current_;

blockquote.pre: friend constexpr difference_type operator-(const iterator& x, const iterator& y) noexcept;
